string GenerateValidIP (string potential_ip)
 Attempts to generate a valid IP address & port from the given string in format like this: "192.168.0.2:2503". If the process fails, then an empty string is returned. More...

void ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::AlignTabbers ( )

Definition at line 110 of file tabberui.c.

111 {
112 float total_size;
113 float x, y;
114
115 Widget tab_controls_container = m_TabControlsRoot.FindAnyWidget( "Tab_Control_Container" );
116 Widget tab_controls_scroller = m_TabControlsRoot.FindAnyWidget( "Tab_Control_Scroller" );
117
118 m_TabControlsRoot.Update();
119 tab_controls_container.Update();
120
121 Widget tab_child = tab_controls_container.GetChildren();
122 while ( tab_child )
123 {
124 if ( tab_child.IsVisible() )
125 {
126 TextWidget tab_text = TextWidget.Cast( tab_child.FindAnyWidget( tab_child.GetName() + "_Title" ) );
127 int t_x, t_y;
128 tab_text.Update();
129 tab_text.GetTextSize( t_x, t_y );
130 tab_child.SetSize( t_x + 10 * m_ResolutionMultiplier, 1 );
131 tab_controls_container.Update();
132
133 total_size += ( t_x + 10 * m_ResolutionMultiplier );
134 }
135
136 tab_child = tab_child.GetSibling();
137 }
138
139 tab_child = tab_controls_container.GetChildren();

143
144 while ( tab_child )
145 {

147 tab_child.GetScreenPos( x, y );
148 tab_bg.SetPos( ( x_f_c - x ), 0 );
149 tab_bg.SetSize( total_size, 1 );
150
151 tab_child = tab_child.GetSibling();
152 }
153
154 m_TabControlsRoot.GetSize( x, y );
155
156 m_TabControlsRoot.SetSize( total_size, y );
157 tab_controls_container.Update();

Get OnScreenPos when forced or targeted component differs

in case of cached item, all above is reused except the position

Definition at line 241 of file actiontargetscursor.c.

242 {
243 float pos_x, pos_y = 0.0;
244
245 PrepareCursorContent();
246
248 if (forceRebuild || m_Target.GetComponentIndex() != m_CachedObject.GetCursorCompIdx())
249 {
250 GetOnScreenPosition(pos_x, pos_y);
251 }
253 else
254 {
255 vector screen_pos = TransformToScreenPos(m_CachedObject.GetCursorWorldPos());
256
257 pos_x = screen_pos[0];
258 pos_y = screen_pos[1];
259 }
260
261 pos_x = Math.Ceil(pos_x);
262 pos_y = Math.Ceil(pos_y);
263
264 Widget parentWdg = m_Root.GetParent();
265
266 float screen_w = 0;
267 float screen_h = 0;
268
269 float wdg_w = 0;
270 float wdg_h = 0;
271
272 parentWdg.GetScreenSize( screen_w, screen_h );
273 m_Root.GetSize( wdg_w, wdg_h );
274
275 if ( pos_x + wdg_w > screen_w )
276 pos_x = screen_w - wdg_w;
277
278 if ( pos_y + wdg_h > screen_h )
279 pos_y = screen_h - wdg_h;
280
281 m_Root.SetPos(pos_x, pos_y);
282 }

◆ GenerateValidIP()

string ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::GenerateValidIP ( string  potential_ip)
inlineprivate

Attempts to generate a valid IP address & port from the given string in format like this: "192.168.0.2:2503". If the process fails, then an empty string is returned.

Definition at line 281 of file serverbrowserfiltercontainer.c.

282 {
283 string correct_ip_format;
284
285 TStringArray array_ip_and_port = new TStringArray;
286 potential_ip.Split( ":", array_ip_and_port );
287
288 string ip_entries;
289 int port;
290
291 if( array_ip_and_port.Count() > 0 )
292 {
293 ip_entries = array_ip_and_port.Get( 0 );
294 TStringArray array_ip = new TStringArray;
295 ip_entries.Split( ".", array_ip );
296
297 string ip_string;
298 int ip_entries_count = array_ip.Count();
299
300 if (ip_entries_count <= 3 || ip_entries_count > 4)
301 return "";
302
303 for ( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
304 {
305 int ip_entry = array_ip.Get(i).ToInt();
306
307 // Check if the entry is a valid number
308 if ( ip_entry > 255 || ip_entry < 0 )
309 ip_entry = 0;
310
311 ip_string = ip_string + ip_entry.ToString();
312
313 if ( i < ip_entries_count - 1 )
314 ip_string = ip_string + ".";
315 ;
316 }
317
318 correct_ip_format = ip_string;
319 }
320 else
321 {
322 ip_entries = "";
323 correct_ip_format = ip_entries;
324 }
325
326 if ( correct_ip_format == "" )
327 return ""; // Input string was not recognized as a valid IP address. Thus return an empty string.
328
329 // The input string was recognized as a valid IP address. Thus continue with port number.
330
331 if( array_ip_and_port.Count() > 1 )
332 {
333 port = array_ip_and_port.Get( 1 ).ToInt();
334
335 if ( port > 65535 | port < 0 ) // max port value is 65535
336 port = 2302;
337
338
339 if ( port >= 0 )
340 correct_ip_format = correct_ip_format + ":" + port.ToString();
341
342 }
343 else
344 {
345 port = 2302;
346 correct_ip_format = correct_ip_format + ":" + port.ToString();
347 }
348
349 return correct_ip_format;
350 }
TStringArray
array< string > TStringArray
Definition: enscript.c:685
string::ToString

Return string representation of variable.

Definition: enstring.c:381

659 //Character filter
660 }
661 if( m_ThirdPersonFilter.IsSet() )
662 {
663 input.SetModeIdFilter( m_ThirdPersonFilter.IsEnabled() );
664 input.SetThirdPerson( m_ThirdPersonFilter.IsEnabled() );
665 }
666 if( m_VersionMatchFilter.IsSet() )
667 {
668 input.SetProperVersionMatch( m_VersionMatchFilter.IsEnabled() );
669 }
670 if( m_BattleyeFilter.IsSet() )
671 {
672 input.SetBattleyeProtection( m_BattleyeFilter.IsEnabled() );
673 //input.SetAntiCheatFilter( m_BattleyeFilter.IsEnabled() );
674 }
675 if( m_PublicFilter.IsSet() )
676 {
677 input.SetPublic( m_PublicFilter.IsEnabled() );
678 }
679 if( m_AcceleratedTimeFilter.IsSet() )
680 {
681 input.SetAcceleratedTime( m_AcceleratedTimeFilter.IsEnabled() );
682 }
683 if( m_PingFilter.IsSet() )
684 {
685 string aa = m_PingFilter.GetOptions()[m_PingFilter.GetValue()];
686 int aaa = aa.Substring(1, aa.Length() - 1).ToInt();
687
688 input.SetPingFilter( aaa );
689 }
690 #endif
691 #endif
692
693 return input;

◆ GetItemDesc() [1/2]

protected string ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::GetItemDesc ( ActionBase  action)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 760 of file actiontargetscursor.c.

761 {
762 string desc = "";
763 Object tgObject = m_DisplayInteractTarget;
764 if ( !tgObject && m_Target )
765 {
766 tgObject = m_Target.GetObject();
767 }
768
769 if ( tgObject )
770 {
771 //BreakOut if item is ruined
772 Object tgParent = m_Target.GetParent();
773 if ( !tgObject.IsAlive() )
774 {
775 //Fetch parent item name if one is present
776 if ( !tgParent || tgObject.DisplayNameRuinAttach() )
777 desc = tgObject.GetDisplayName();
778 else
779 desc = tgParent.GetDisplayName();
780 return desc;
781 }
782
783 EntityAI targetEntity;
784
785 if ( tgParent && ( tgParent.IsItemBase() || tgParent.IsTransport() ) )
786 {
787 targetEntity = EntityAI.Cast( tgParent );
788 }
789
790 if ( tgObject.IsItemBase() || tgObject.IsTransport() )
791 {
792 targetEntity = EntityAI.Cast( tgObject );
793 }
794
795 if ( targetEntity && targetEntity.ShowZonesHealth() )
796 {
797 string zone = "";
798
799 array<string> selections = new array<string>();
800
801 //NOTE: relevant fire geometry and view geometry selection names MUST match in order to get a valid damage zone
802 if (targetEntity.IsInherited(TentBase) && TentBase.Cast(targetEntity).GetState() != TentBase.PACKED)
803 {
804 //This is really specific to tents, as they use proxies. Hence object must be used
805 if (DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneFromComponentName(targetEntity, tgObject.GetActionComponentName(m_Target.GetComponentIndex(), LOD.NAME_FIRE), zone))
806 {
807 desc = DamageSystem.GetDamageDisplayName(targetEntity, zone);
808 }
809 }
810 else
811 {
812 targetEntity.GetActionComponentNameList(m_Target.GetComponentIndex(), selections, LOD.NAME_VIEW);
813
814 //Important to get display name from component tied to multiple selections
815 for (int s = 0; s < selections.Count(); s++)
816 {
817 if ( DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneFromComponentName(targetEntity, selections[s], zone))
818 {
819 desc = DamageSystem.GetDamageDisplayName(targetEntity, zone);
820 }
821 }
822 }
823 }
824
825 //Safety check to output something to widget
826 if ( targetEntity && desc == "" )
827 desc = targetEntity.GetDisplayName();
828 }
829
830 return desc;
831 }

◆ GetItemHealth() [1/2]

protected int ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::GetItemHealth ( )
inlineprivate

Definition at line 833 of file actiontargetscursor.c.

834 {
835 int health = -1;
836
837 if ( m_Interact && !m_Interact.HasTarget() )
838 {
839 return health;
840 }
841
842 Object tgObject = m_DisplayInteractTarget;
843 if (!tgObject && m_Target)
844 {
845 tgObject = m_Target.GetObject();
846 }
847
848 if ( tgObject )
849 {
850 Object tgParent = m_Target.GetParent();
851 EntityAI targetEntity;
852
853 //Return specific part health, even if display name is from parent
854 if ( !tgObject.IsAlive() )
855 {
856 health = tgObject.GetHealthLevel();
857 return health;
858 }
859
860 if ( tgParent && ( tgParent.IsItemBase() || tgParent.IsTransport() ) )
861 {
862 targetEntity = EntityAI.Cast( tgParent );
863 }
864
865 if ( tgObject.IsItemBase() || tgObject.IsTransport() )
866 {
867 targetEntity = EntityAI.Cast( tgObject );
868 }
869

871 {
872 if ( !targetEntity.IsDamageDestroyed() )
873 {
874 string zone = "";
875 array<string> selections = new array<string>();
876
877 if (targetEntity.IsInherited(TentBase) && TentBase.Cast(targetEntity).GetState() != TentBase.PACKED)
878 {
879 //This is really specific to tents, as they use proxies. Hence object must be used
880 if ( DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneFromComponentName(targetEntity, tgObject.GetActionComponentName(m_Target.GetComponentIndex(), LOD.NAME_FIRE), zone))
881 {
882 health = targetEntity.GetHealthLevel(zone);
883 }
884 }
885 else
886 {
887 //NOTE: relevant view geometry and view geometry selection names MUST match in order to get a valid damage zone
888 targetEntity.GetActionComponentNameList(m_Target.GetComponentIndex(), selections, LOD.NAME_VIEW);
889
890 for (int s = 0; s < selections.Count(); s++)
891 {
892 if (DamageSystem.GetDamageZoneFromComponentName(targetEntity , selections[s], zone))
893 {
894 health = targetEntity.GetHealthLevel(zone);
895 break;
896 }
897 }
898 }
899
900 if (zone == "")
901 health = targetEntity.GetHealthLevel();
902 }
903 }
904 else
905 {
906 health = tgObject.GetHealthLevel();
907 }
908 }
909
910 return health;
911 }

301 {
302 if ( m_EntityInHands )
303 {
304 InventoryItem item = InventoryItem.Cast(m_EntityInHands);

306 if (q_type > 0)

kept for backward compatibility

Get memory LOD from p3d

save selection from memory lod

cache current object and the widget world pos

doors/handles

single vertex in selection

multiple vertices in selection

cache current object and the widget world pos

do not store component index for doors/handles

ladders handling

cache current object and the widget world pos

do not store component index for ladders

78 objectPos = m_TargetObject.GetPosition();

81 else
82 { objectPos[1] = objectPos[1] + DEFAULT_HANDLE_OFFSET; }
83 }
84 else
85 {
86 // default position for the action cursor
87 traceMatched = false;
88 isDefaultPos = true;
89 }
90

92 {

94 // and we do not want to display it
95 x = 0.0;
96 y = 0.0;
97 }
98 else

100 // calculate screen position from traced results
101 if( isDefaultPos )

103 int w,h;
104 GetScreenSize(w, h);
105 x = w/2;
106 y = h/2;
107 }
108 else
109 {
110 vector screen_pos = GetGame().GetScreenPos( objectPos );
111 x = screen_pos[0];
112 y = screen_pos[1];
113 }
114 }

116 objectPos = "0 0 0";
117 isDefaultPos = false;

77 {
78 string day_symbol = "d"; //define symbols
79 string hour_symbol = "h";
80 string minute_symbol = "min";
81
82 if ( total_time > 0 )
83 {
84 string time_string;
85 int time_seconds = total_time; //convert total time to int
86
87 int days = time_seconds / 3600 / 24;
88 int hours = time_seconds / 3600 % 24;
89 int minutes = ( time_seconds % 3600 ) / 60;
90
91 if ( days > 0 )
92 {
93 time_string += GetValueString( days ) + day_symbol; //days
94 time_string += " "; //separator
95 }
96
97 if ( hours > 0 || days > 0 )
98 {
99 time_string += GetValueString( hours ) + hour_symbol; //hours
100 time_string += " "; //separator
101 }
102
103 if ( minutes >= 0 )
104 {
105 time_string += GetValueString( minutes ) + minute_symbol; //minutes
106 }
107
108 return time_string;
109 }
110
111 return "0" + " " + minute_symbol;

142 if ( total_value > 0 )
143 {
144 string out_string;
145
146 int total_value_int = total_value;
147 string number_str = total_value_int.ToString();
148
149 //number
150 if ( total_value >= 1000 )
151 {
152 int count;
153 int first_length = number_str.Length() % 3; //calculate position of the first separator
154 if ( first_length > 0 )
155 {
156 count = 3 - first_length;
157 }
158
159 for ( int i = 0; i < number_str.Length(); ++i )
160 {
161 out_string += number_str.Get( i );
162 count ++;
163
164 if ( count >= 3 )
165 {
166 out_string += " "; //separator
167 count = 0;
168 }
169 }
170 }
171 else
172 {
173 out_string = number_str;

186 }
187 }
188

190 }

protected void ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::OnInputDeviceChanged ( EInputDeviceType  pInputDeviceType)

Definition at line 172 of file actiontargetscursor.c.

173 {
174 switch (pInputDeviceType)
175 {
176 case EInputDeviceType.CONTROLLER:
177 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("interact", true);
178 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("continuous_interact", true);
179 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("continuous", true);
180 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("single", true);
181 break;
182
183 default:
184 bool isMouseEnabled = true;
185 #ifdef PLATFORM_CONSOLE
186 isMouseEnabled = GetGame().GetInput().IsEnabledMouseAndKeyboardEvenOnServer();
187 #endif
188
189 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("interact", !isMouseEnabled);
190 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("continuous_interact", !isMouseEnabled);
191 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("continuous", !isMouseEnabled);
192 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("single", !isMouseEnabled);
193 break;
194 }

127 isMouseEnabled = GetGame().GetInput().IsEnabledMouseAndKeyboardEvenOnServer();
128 #endif
129

131 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("ia_continuous_interact", !isMouseEnabled);
132 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("ia_continuous", !isMouseEnabled);
133 ShowXboxHidePCIcons("ia_single", !isMouseEnabled);
134 break;
135 }
136 }

◆ OptionsMenuGame()

void ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::OptionsMenuGame ( Widget  parent,
Widget  details_root,
GameOptions  options,
OptionsMenu  menu

◆ ProcessIntoIPAddress()

bool ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::ProcessIntoIPAddress ( out string  potential_ip)
inlineprivate

Removes all characters from the given string whirh are NOT a number, '.' or ':'. Returns true if any change was done to the input text.

Definition at line 243 of file serverbrowserfiltercontainer.c.

244 {
245 bool was_text_changed = false;
246 int length = potential_ip.Length();
247
248 // Filter out incompatible characters
249 for ( int i = length - 1 ; i >= 0; --i )
250 {
251 string character = potential_ip.Get(i);
252
253 if ( character.ToInt() == 0 && character != "0" && character != "." && character != ":" )
254 {
255 potential_ip = potential_ip.SubstringInverted(potential_ip, i, i + 1);
256 was_text_changed = true;
257 }
258 }
259
260 bool text_was_shortened = LimitTextBoxCharacterCount( potential_ip, 21 );
261

263 }

122 {

139 output = "#keybind_doubletap";

79 {
80 if( countbind > 0 )
81 output += ", ";
82
83 output += GetUApi().GetButtonName( pInput.Binding(0) );
84 countbind++;
85
86 for( i = 1; i < pInput.BindingCount(); i++ )
87 {
88 if( pInput.Binding(i) != 0 )
89 {
90 output += " + " + GetUApi().GetButtonName( pInput.Binding(i) );
91 countbind++;
92 }
93 }
94
95 }
96 }
97 }
98 else
99 {
100 if( pInput.BindingCount() > 0 )
101 {
102 if( pInput.Binding(0) != 0 && pInput.CheckBindDevice(0,iDeviceFlags) )
103 {
104 if( countbind > 0 )
105 output += ", ";
106
107 output += GetUApi().GetButtonName( pInput.Binding(0) );
108 countbind++;
109 }
110 }
111 }
112
113 }
114
115 // nothing may be available - we do not want "null" or "0" in string
116 if( countbind > 0 )
117 btnWidget.SetText(output);
118 else
119 btnWidget.SetText("");
120 }

1035 healthMark.SetColor(Colors.COLOR_RUINED);
1036 healthMark.SetAlpha(0.5);
1037 healthMark.GetParent().Show(true);
1038 break;
1039 default :

1041 healthMark.SetAlpha(0.5);
1042 healthMark.GetParent().Show(true);

1044 }

1047 }

◆ SetItemQuantity() [1/2]

protected void ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::SetItemQuantity ( int  type,

int  max,

)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 1052 of file actiontargetscursor.c.

1053 {
1054 Widget widget;
1055
1056 widget = m_Root.FindAnyWidget(itemWidget);
1057
1058 if (enabled)
1059 {
1060 ProgressBarWidget progressBar;
1061 TextWidget textWidget;
1062 Class.CastTo(progressBar, widget.FindAnyWidget(quantityPBWidget));
1063 Class.CastTo(textWidget, widget.FindAnyWidget(quantityTextWidget));
1064
1065 //check for volume vs. count and display progressbar or "bubble" with exact count/max text
1066 switch (type)
1067 {
1068 case QUANTITY_HIDDEN :
1069 progressBar.Show(false);
1070 textWidget.Show(false);
1071 textWidget.GetParent().Show(false);
1072 break;
1073 case QUANTITY_COUNT :
1074 if (max > 1 || current > 1)
1075 {
1076 string qty_text = string.Format("%1/%2", Math.Round(current).ToString(), max.ToString());
1077 progressBar.Show(false);
1078 textWidget.SetText(qty_text);
1079 textWidget.Show(true);
1080 textWidget.GetParent().Show(true);
1081 }
1082 else
1083 {
1084 progressBar.Show(false);
1085 textWidget.Show(false);
1086 textWidget.GetParent().Show(false);
1087 }
1088 break;
1089 case QUANTITY_PROGRESS :
1090 float qty_num = Math.Round( ( current / max ) * 100 );
1091
1092 textWidget.Show(false);
1093 progressBar.SetCurrent(qty_num);
1094 progressBar.Show(true);
1095 textWidget.GetParent().Show(true);
1096 break;
1097 }
1098 widget.Show(true);
1099 }
1100 else
1101 widget.Show(false);
1102 }

References Class::CastTo(), m_Root, QUANTITY_COUNT, QUANTITY_HIDDEN, QUANTITY_PROGRESS, Math::Round(), float::ToString(), and string::ToString().

Referenced by BuildCursor(), and PrepareCursorContent().

◆ SetPopulation()

void ScriptedWidgetEventHandler::SetPopulation ( int  population,
int  slots 
)
inlineprivate

Definition at line 333 of file serverbrowserentry.c.

334 {
335 string pop_text = "#server_browser_entry_empty";
336
337 if ( slots > 0 )
338 {
339 float pop_percentage = population / slots;
340
341 if ( population == 0 )
342 pop_text = "#server_browser_entry_empty";
343 else if ( pop_percentage < 0.33 )
344 pop_text = "#server_browser_entry_low";
345 else if ( pop_percentage < 0.66 )
346 pop_text = "#server_browser_entry_medium";
347 else if ( pop_percentage != 1 )
348 pop_text = "#server_browser_entry_high";
349 else
350 pop_text = "#server_browser_entry_full";
351 }
352
353 m_ServerPopulation.SetText( pop_text );
354 }

379 if ( time != "" )
380 {
381 TStringArray arr = new TStringArray;
382

384

386 {
387 int hour = arr.Get( 0 ).ToInt();

397 else //Day

479

481 {
482 if (Magnum_Base.Cast(wpn))
483 {
484 mag_quantity = 0;
485 for (int j = 0; j < wpn.GetMuzzleCount(); j++)
486 {
487 if(wpn.IsChamberFull(j)&& !wpn.IsChamberFiredOut(j))
488 mag_quantity++;
489 }
490 wpn_qty = mag_quantity.ToString();
491 }
492 else
493 {
494 for (int i = 0; i < wpn.GetMuzzleCount(); i++)
495 {

497 {

499 }
500 if (wpn.IsChamberEmpty(i))
501 {
502 wpn_qty = wpn_qty + "0";
503 }
504 else if (wpn.IsChamberFiredOut(i))
505 {
506 wpn_qty = wpn_qty + "F";
507 }
508 else
509 {
510 wpn_qty = wpn_qty + "1";
511 }
512
513 maga = wpn.GetMagazine(i);
514 if (maga)
515 {
516 mag_quantity = maga.GetAmmoCount();
517 }
518 else if (wpn.GetInternalMagazineMaxCartridgeCount(i) > 0)
519 {
520 mag_quantity = wpn.GetInternalMagazineCartridgeCount(i);
521 }
522
523 }
524
525 if (wpn.IsJammed())
526 {
527 if (mag_quantity != -1 )
528 wpn_qty = string.Format("X (+%1)", mag_quantity);
529 else
530 wpn_qty = "X";
531 }
532 else
533 {
534 if(mag_quantity != -1 )
535 {
536 wpn_qty = wpn_qty + " (" + mag_quantity.ToString() + ")";
537 }
538 }
539 }
540 }
541
542 progressBar.Show(false);
543 textWidget.SetText(wpn_qty);

546 }
547 else
548 widget.Show(false);
549 }

361 {

363 {
364 //Print(">> non-cached widget");
365 m_CachedObject.Invalidate();

368 m_Hidden = false;
369 return;
370 }

372 {
373 //Print(">> non-cached widget (fixed)");
374 m_CachedObject.Invalidate();
375 BuildFixedCursor();
376 m_Root.Show(true);
377 m_FixedOnPosition = false;
378 m_Hidden = false;
379 return;
380 }
381 }
383 else if (m_Target.GetObject() == m_CachedObject.Get())
384 {
385 if (!m_FixedOnPosition)
386 {
387 //Print(">> cached widget");
388 BuildFloatingCursor(false);
389 m_Root.Show(true);
390 m_Hidden = false;
391 return;
392 }
393 else
394 {
395 //Print(">> cached widget (fixed)");
396 m_CachedObject.Invalidate();
397 BuildFixedCursor();
398 m_Root.Show(true);
399 m_FixedOnPosition = false;
400 m_Hidden = false;
401 return;
402 }
403 }
404 }
405 else
406 {
407 if (m_Root.IsVisible())
408 {
409 m_CachedObject.Invalidate();
410 m_Root.Show(false);
411 m_Hidden = false;
412
413 // remove previous backlit
414 GetDayZGame().GetBacklit().HintClear();
415 }
416 }
417 }
418 else

42 if( m_Player && m_Player.IsPlayerSelected() && m_Player.IsRaised() && !m_Player.IsInIronsights() && !GetGame().IsInventoryOpen() )
43 {
44 float sx, sy;
45
46 GetCrosshairPosition();
47 vector screenSpace = GetGame().GetScreenPos(m_Position);
48
49 m_Root.GetSize(sx, sy);
50 screenSpace[0] = screenSpace[0] - sx/2;
51 screenSpace[1] = screenSpace[1] - sy/2;
52
53 m_Root.SetPos(screenSpace[0], screenSpace[1]);
54 m_Root.Show(m_Visible);
55 }
56 else
57 {
58 m_Root.Show(false);
59 m_Position = vector.Zero;
60 }
61 }

469 {
470 int i;
471 int c;
472 int index;
473 int width;
474 int height;
475 int row;
476 int col;
477 InventoryItem item;
478 vector data;
479 Widget bck;
480 Widget item_w;
481
482 // remove not actual items
483 c = m_Items.Count();
484 for (i = 0; i < c; i++)
485 {
486 item = m_Items.GetKey(i);
487
488 bool remove_item = false;
489
490 if (items.Contains(item) == false)
491 {
492 remove_item = true;
493 }
494 else
495 {
496 // check items position actual
497 if ((m_Items.Get(item) - items.Get(item)).LengthSq() > 0.01)
498 {
499 // item has different position or size
500 remove_item = true;
501 }
502 }
503
504 if (remove_item)
505 {
506 RemoveItem(item);
507 c--;
508 i--;
509 }
510 }
511
512 // add new items
513 for (i = 0; i < items.Count(); i++)
514 {
515 item = items.GetKey(i);
516 data = items.Get(item);
517
518 if (m_Items.Contains(item) == false)
519 {
520 AddItem(item, data, Vector(0,0,0) );
521 }
522 }
523
524 // add new items
525 for (i = 0; i < items.Count(); i++)
526 {
527 item = items.GetKey(i);
528 data = items.Get(item);
529 // refresh quantity
530 RefreshItemVariables( item, data, show_quantity, show_temperature );
531 }
532 }
